analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/12/0xcdcf7570e27fe31ad5c6d4c8c7d78d98507d649d.sol:
	Contract EOSCToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/12/0xcdcf7570e27fe31ad5c6d4c8c7d78d98507d649d.sol#205-206)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/12/0xcdcf7570e27fe31ad5c6d4c8c7d78d98507d649d.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/12/0xcdcf7570e27fe31ad5c6d4c8c7d78d98507d649d.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/12/0xcdcf7570e27fe31ad5c6d4c8c7d78d98507d649d.sol#74-75) is not in mixedCase
